data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: In a PHP file you can intermix PHP code and static content. When ____ file ____ executed ____ the PHP code ____ executed. The ____ from ____ code ____ the ____ part ____ the ____ of ____ program ____ the ____ content ____. This design makes it easy to generate web pages using a template and injecting dynamic content into parts of the page.
data.partBlankContent: In a PHP file you can intermix PHP code and static content. When t__ file i_ executed on__ the PHP code ge__ executed. The out___ from t__ code repl____ the co__ part for____ the out___ of t__ program wi__ the sta___ content int___. This design makes it easy to generate web pages using a template and injecting dynamic content into parts of the page.
data.answer: 在PHP文件中，可以混合使用PHP代码和静态内容。当文件被执行时，只有PHP代码被执行。代码的输出用完整的静态内容替换构成程序输出的代码部分。这种设计使得使用模板生成网页和将动态内容注入到页面的各个部分变得容易。
